name: Trick Shot (itch) (hydegriffen)
description:
A bizarrely fun combination of Air Hockey and Pinball which resolves to a simple physics puzzle game. 

Tap the goal to restart a level. If there is a number higher than 0 in the top left corner, it means you are sandboxed into the last level to rack up a high score. 

Save / load features, additional levels and mechanics, menus, settings, and more to be added in future releases.
